articles.title: IOC prez: ICE, Epstein files 'sad' distractions from Games - ESPN
articles.description: With the opening ceremony of the Milan Cortina Winter Games set for Friday, IOC president Kirsty Coventry said American storylines of ICE and the Epstein files have been "sad" distractions.
articles.content:
Feb 1, 2026, 12:42 PM ET
MILAN -- Two years before the Los Angeles Olympics, the United States is already dominating the narrative in the run-up to the opening ceremony of the Milan Cortina Winter G… [+3196 chars]
